review: Hands down one of the best things I've bought in awhile. I also got it for $19.99 during that 2 day deal Amazon was offering. I like it as much as my Apple TV. It's way better than my Roku. If you are an Amazon Prime member you get so much free media (movies, music, TV shows). Also, every vinyl or CD I bought through Amazon shows up as a purchased item in my music files. The stick took me literally 2 minutes to plug in a set up.....it was already hooked up to my Prime account. I already told my friends and family to purchase this, I believe it is already back ordered. It is definitely a must have and is worth the $39.99 price tag it now is.

review: I really like the fire stick.  I love being able to play my prime music through the TV, so I don't have to waste my phone battery, or leave my laptop sitting out inconveniently.  I am still getting to  know all the features, but am enjoying it a lot so far.  I just need another fire device, so I can swipe from the tablet to the tv to watch some streaming shows, since I don't have hulu plus.
